oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Legal brief (typed manuscript), Plessy v. Ferguson, Argument of A.W. Tourgée, undated
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Legal brief (typed manuscript), Plessy v. Ferguson, Argument of A.W. Tourgée, undated. This brief appears to be a draft of an argument to be given in the Supreme Court of the United States case. In it, Tourgée references the other brief he and James C. Walker had already submitted to the Court. Arguments began April 18, 1896, and the Supreme Court of the United States issued its decision May 18, 1896; therefore, the date of this brief must be sometime in 1896.
